content.body: one thing to kick off the staging directory might be, to move all of the old proposal-temporal tests (which we are gradually converting into the test262 format) into the staging directory

content.body: proposal-temporal is not "an implementor" as such, but we do have tests that it would be beneficial for implementors to execute already

content.body: Ms2ger was coincidentally thinking along those lines a few weeks ago and did an experiment with porting the old tests to use the test262 assertions: https://github.com/tc39/test262/pull/3591/files
